product_name: Canari Vortex Bike Shorts - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: The 8-panel Canari Vortex bike shorts feature an anatomic design and a gel chamois for great fit and riding comfort. Polyester/spandex fabric has a firm stretch and fit to support muscles; it's also breathable and quick drying. Chamois reduces nerve stress and saddle pressure, and absorbs road shock. Flatseam construction is soft and non-chafing next to skin. Elasticized waist and soft touch leg grippers keep shorts from bunching as you ride. Special buy.
short_description: The 8-panel Canari Vortex bike shorts feature an anatomic design and a gel chamois for great fit and riding comfort.
